entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
